entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sparwood Airport 08:42 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.2°C
Wind: SSE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow with periods of ice pellets early this morning and with periods of rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this morning and early this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm except 5 cm over northern sections. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain near noon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
